header.title: UAS System Integration & Operation
header.description: Our specialists excel in systems integration and mission-ready operations for unmanned aerial systems (UAS). We combine cutting-edge flight control integration, harness and configuration management, and propulsion system testing to deliver reliable and sophisticated solutions.

articles.title: System Integration
articles.description: Our integration team provides reliable, fast, and excellent UAV system integration, covering everything from autopilot integration and configuration to sensor and actuator calibration, interface design, and mission equipment integration.

articles.title: Harness Integration
articles.description: The MARS Integration team specializes in MIL-STD, highly reliable, and redundant electrical harness integration for UAS.

articles.title: Propulsion System Integration & Testing
articles.description: The MARS team has accumulated extensive experience in propulsion system integration and testing, both on a test bench and on the platform itself. We provide full end-to-end engine qualification techniques to customers throughout the region.

articles.title: Static & Flight Testing
articles.description: Our team specializes in UAV first power-up and configuration, along with static testing that includes power checks and control surface authority. We also conduct end-to-end operations and flight testing, integrating mission equipment to maximize operational effectiveness and mission success

articles.title: Ground Control Management & Support
articles.description: Our software team is capable of troubleshooting and interfacing with all kinds of software standards used in ground control stations.

chooseUs.title: Let's Work Together
chooseUs.description: Ready to take the next step? Contact us today to discuss your needs and explore how our expertise can drive your success.
